title: SAMSUNG 324 L Frost Free Double Door 3 Star Convertible Refrigerator  (Elegant Inox, RT34T4513S8/HL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Unit Refrigerator, User Manual with Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor From Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Twin Cooling Plus: With the Twin Cooling Plus feature, you can store your food in optimal conditions so that all your perishables stay fresh and moist for long twice as long. This helps reduce food wastage.
product_description.Digital Inverter Technology: This refrigerator has a Digital Inverter Compressor that pays attention to the cooling demand and automatically adjusts the speed accordingly. This gives you quiet operation, less power consumption, and durability.

review:
First of all thanks to Flipkart for their two day safe delivery. I received the product with not even a single scratch.
Coming to the product , it's spacious and suitable for a family with 5-6 members. Two separate motors for freezer and refrigerator made me impressed. Samsung's unique 5in1 convertible technology is pretty useful.
There are two side racks in the freezer also in which we can keep small items such as Chocolates , nail polishes etc.. Freezer space is also huge.Deodorizing filter made of natural fibre helps the smell inside the refrigerator to get out. There are four toughened glass shelves and a big Vegetables basket at the bottom.
There is only one bottle guard which will accommodate just 5 bottles which is a little bit uncomfortable. However we can keep the bottles in the shelves and even in the freezer. The cooling controls are very simple to operate.
Over all the refrigerator is in perfect working condition . If you are looking for the extra space , without a doubt go for it.

The refrigerator is according to our needs, 5in 1 convertible option is very useful, it consumes less power, during power-cut works for nearly an hour with a single battery UPS, doesn't have light in the freezer compartment, no extra fruit box or dual veg box, compartments in the refrigerator are as in the image. No lock available. No wheels are available in the base. The color looks elegant & classy. Only the front portion is of elegant Inox with classy finish , the 2sides are of different material (fibre).

Got my 253 ltr refrigerator exactly within 3 days safe and swift delivery by Ekart. Demonstration done next day nicely by Samsung Service engineer. Wonderful, premium look and very silent refrigerator with 3 in 1 convertible inverter technology. Really love it thanks Flipkart.

A must buy, if you need a bigger sized fridge. Optimal space design. Bottle holder at door are sufficiently wide and tall to hold 2.25L cold drink bottle, juice cartoon, milk cartoon, etc. The ice tray and storage box comes as a independent unit, which upon need can be removes from the freezer to increase the storage space. Similarly a tray halves the freezer into two, which is also removable.
Led lighting inside the fridge, tempered glass shelves.
I definitely recommend this product.
Flipkart delivered it on promised time and with outmost care. But they should lower the delivery time significantly. Upon ordering, the seller didn't ship for approximately 10 days, then the travel time was around 4-5 days. Hence it would be much convenient for a customer if flipkart could deliver the large products at a time window of 4-5 days rather than setting idle for 15 days.

I definitely recomend this product..... Samsung is the best refrigerator that I used.. Wonderful performance and design... Low power conception... The delivery guys are so coperative and safe delivary... Installation and demo was in the next day of delivary..... Thanks flipkart

Overall it excellent refrigerator by samsung

Wanted a convertible model as It can add up space when needed and finalised on samsung and lg after a lot of research all the guns were pointed towards LG for their stronghold in the field of electronics and also the after sales support but a little scifi look and design made me go for samsung!:-p. And I have no regrets till date with the decision I have made. Waited for the power bill to post this review and the refrigerator scored well in that field too. The power consumption is minimal. Freezer has no light but it was never a problem for me. The main thing I liked about it was the silent functionality and the control system which is external that you don't need to open the refrigerator to change any control. The led inside is cool! The glass shelves are considerably strong as mentioned. Removable ice maker is great. 2 big shelves are given for the eggs which are of no use to me as I don't feel it a good idea to place the eggs in the refrigerator which are mostly content with salmonella and many other bacteria!
The installation was also smooth but only thing I didn't like was the delivery as the delivery is extremely rough and had a minor dent on the back of refrigerator but decided to live on with it as performance isn't affected and its mostly invisible. Overall a great buy.

This is really an amazing product. I had a fixed space and was doubting whether it fits it but, went with a gut feel as I was need in of 300+ litre capacity fridge and finally, extremely satisfied and very happy about the purchase.

Booked on Saturday night, arrived on Monday evening and installation from Samsung got finished by Tuesday morning.

This fridge has all the features mentioned, scratch and dent free, and wondered to get a really a very fresh piece as I had noticed the manufacturing month and year is the same month I had purchased.

I will definitely recommend this exciting choice when you are looking for 300+ litre capacity with all latest features and height under 161 cm (163 cm is the height of the door and it doesn't impact my fixed space).

Many thanks to the seller and keep rocking !

Using this fridge for the past one month. Below are the pros & cons,
Pros:
1. Overall good packing and good installation experience from Samsung. Decent delivery experience from Flipkart.
2. The product build quality is quite good and looks modern and aesthetic.
3. The functioning and cooling is also good.
4. The lower tray can be adjusted up or down depending on the height of the vessels. (Mother's requirement)
5. Enough capacity for a family of 5 members.
6. No need for stabilizer as mentioned on the fridge.
7. Flushed handle means no projections or sharp corners.
8. Easy controls on the door to increase or decrease the freezer and fridge temperature.
9. Easy to change using the convertible mode on the fridge (just long press the button).

Cons:
1. No light in the freezer. (Most brands don't have it)
2. Easy slide tray is nice but height cannot be adjusted.
2. Tall bottle compartment on the door should have detachable option. As we don't use tall bottles and the space is wasted.

Update #1: 21-Jan-2021 (3 months of purchase)
This refrigerator has a serious water leakage issue. There is a tray behind the refrigerator that collects water and uses a coil to evaporate it. This is how frost-free refrigerators work. However, this refrigerator has a manufacturing defect that in slightly humid conditions, the tray fills up and you are left mopping your floor everyday. Since the tray is also locked and hidden away, you cannot discard the water as you would do in your old school manual defrost refrigerators. The reason I am confident of a manufacturer quality issue is because this refrigerator was replaced by Samsung 1.5 months ago for me with a brand new unit due to this same reason. The second unit also developed the same issue within 15 days of use. I am fighting with Samsung and the service center to resolve the issue. But please buy this with great discretion. Removed 2 stars.

Update #2: 08-Feb-2021 (4 months of purchase)
Samsung refuses to give a cash refund. They only give you limited use vouchers that you can redeem online or in-store in SAMSUNG STORES AND WEBSITE ONLY. The voucher is for the final no-cost EMI price you have paid from your card. So you are left with EMIs for the existing refrigerator, GST loss, any extended warranty loss and finally being forced to purchase a new refrigerator at extremely inflated prices in their outlets. Despite having purchased numerous products from Samsung, I have been left at a financial loss and mental agony.

Original Review:
A very dashing and contemporary looking refrigerator. The refrigerator is quite spacious and trays run deep. The 275L is about 5.5 feet tall without stand. Just the right size for people switching from single door 195L models like me. I chose the size considering that I need about 175L of storage without converting freezer to fridge in hot summers. However, Convertible mode works very well in extending storage space as advertised. Solidly built with no wobbling at all. Matte finish so fingerprints are less visible. No major heating concerns. Totally happy with Flipkart delivery and installation experience.
If anything, the bottle tray for large bottles is provided on top rather than bottom. The tray is too wide -perfect fit for those 2L soft drinks. But we don't use soft drinks so our usual 1L water bottles tend to wobble or tilt when we open the door too fast.
Good product, less energy consuming, value for money, got from Flipkart without any damage

This product in its 2013 avatar was bought by us in our home town Bhubaneswar. The 2020 variant is the same thing but with 2 excellent additions.
1. The fridge despite being rated 3 Star is actually a 5 star from 2018. This is because of new rule changes of BES that makes 4/5 star rating for such a big fridge impossible. So the consumption is only 224 units per year.
2. Now the other advantage is this fridge is a convertible model where you can change the Freezer between Freezer, Fridge or just a Storage space. And the bottom fridge can switch between being a fridge or just a storage rack. Now this will be beneficial if you are going out for vacations or at home alone with less requirement of fridge. Thereby, saving you some bucks on energy bill.
